result.execSummary:
All charges against Shranda M Oden in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shranda M Oden is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Oden, Shranda M

Attorney Charles Robert Roozen in court.  Thaddeus P McGuire appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Matter in Court for review hearing. Case set for 830am, case called at 929am. No appearance by defendant. Court issues BENCH WARRANT as to SHRANDA M ODEN with remand to commissioner. Court orders bail forfeited.
Court lowers Justice Point Monitoring to Level 2. All previously ordered conditions of bond remain the same.

Defendant Shranda M Oden in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Thaddeus P McGuire appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Deferred Prosecution Agreement Hearing. State has complied with victim notification and case proceeds with the DPA. Case passed to allow the defendant to speak with client. Case recalled at 9:26 a.m. Court VACATES the Jury Trial date. State is willing to hold this case open to allow the defendant the chance to pay restitution in this case. Court orders the defendant to return to the next court date with $300.00 to be paid towards restitution. Defense counsel also requests Justice Point Monitoring lowered to Level 2. Court GRANTED this request. Case remains calendared in Br 45.  Review hearing scheduled for January 16, 2019 at 08:30 am.

STATES MOTION IN LIMINE, received and filed.
STATES WITNESS LIST, received and filed.

Defendant Shranda M Oden in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Anthony Jackson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Final pre-trial conference held. State places the final offer on the record. Defendant would like to take advantage of the State's offer, so it  will be left open until the next court date. Case is adjourned for a Deferred Prosecution Agreement Hearing in Br 45. The Jury Trial date remains set for 11-05-2018 at 8:30 a.m.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for October 18, 2018 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Shranda M Oden in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Thaddeus P McGuire appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests an adjournment to meet with client. Court orders case passed for defense to meet with client. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Court grants defense request, DPA to remain open until Final Pretrial date. Court reorders Justice Point and all conditions.  Case is adjourned to Br. 45.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 7, 2018 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 5, 2018 at 08:30 am.
